committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Wenatchee River in Washington as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
short_title: Wenatchee River Fisheries and Recreational Protection Act

summary.text: Wenatchee River Fisheries and Recreational Protection Act - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Wenatchee River, Washington, as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a Local Advisory Group to develop a management plan for the river. Sets forth limitations on the acquisition of scenic easements or land in relation to the wild and scenic river designation.

titles.title: Wenatchee River Fisheries and Recreational Protection Act
To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Wenatchee River in Washington as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
